shows.title: The Undercover Hippy
shows.desc: Pretty much a textbook definition of feel-good, the Undercover Hippy is the vehicle for drum-and-bass-MC-turned-singer-songwriter Billy Rowan. With reggae rhythms, witty lyrics, and more hooks than a Peter Pan convention, Billy calls it “music for the thinking man to shake his arse to”. We would concur, though feeling it necessary to point out that other varieties of arse are available.
